clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Mycophenolate Mofetil (CellCept) in Lung Transplant Recipients
clinical_study.official_title: Pharmacokinetics of Mycophenolate Mofetil in de Novo Lung Allograft Recipients

brief_summary.textblock: This open-label, single center study will assess the pharmacokinetics, efficacy and safety of mycophenolate mofetil in lung allograft recipients. Participants will be split into 2 groups according to the original disease: Group A (cystic fibrosis) and Group B (chronic obstructive pulmonary disease [COPD], emphysema, idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis, alpha-1 antitrypsin deficiency [A1AD]). All participants will receive mycophenolate mofetil orally, 1.5 grams (g) twice daily (BID) from Day 2 to 30 post transplantation, and 1 g BID from Day 31 to 90 post transplantation. Anticipated time on study treatment is 90 days, and target sample size is 50-100 individuals.

secondary_outcome.measure: Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second (FEV1) at Day 90 Post-Transplantation
secondary_outcome.description: FEV1 is the amount of air which can be forcibly exhaled from the lungs in the first second of a forced exhalation.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent of Predicted FEV1 at Day 90 Post-Transplantation
secondary_outcome.description: FEV1 is the amount of air which can be forcibly exhaled from the lungs in the first second of a forced exhalation. Percent predicted FEV1 [%] = (FEV1 [L] / Predicted normal value FEV1 [L]) * 100%

secondary_outcome.measure: Forced Vital Capacity (FVC) at Day 90 Post-Transplantation
secondary_outcome.description: FVC at Day 90 post-transplantation is reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Intracellular Adenosine-Tri-Phosphate (iATP) Levels
Change From Baseline in T-Cell Phenotype
secondary_outcome.description: Reported values are change in the T-cell phenotype status from baseline to Day 20 and 90 for cluster of differentiation (CD) 3, CD19, CD4, CD4CD25, CD28, CD45RA, CD45RO, CD69, CD127, and CD152.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Opportunistic Infections
secondary_outcome.description: Opportunistic infections included all infections which occurred due to aspergillus, candida, pneumocystis, cryptococcus, listeria, herpes zoster, herpes simplex, cytomegalovirus pathogens.

arm_group.description: Participants with cystic fibrosis will receive mycophenolate mofetil 1.5 g, orally (PO), BID from Days 2 through 30 post-transplantation, and 1 g, PO, BID from Days 31 through 90 post-transplantation.

Participants with COPD, emphysema, idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis, or A1AD will receive mycophenolate mofetil 1.5 g, PO, BID, from Days 2 through 30 post-transplantation, and 1 g, PO, BID from Days 31 through 90 post-transplantation.

intervention.description: 1.5 g PO BID from Days 2 to 30 post-transplantation, 1 g PO BID Days 31 to 90 post-transplantation

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- primary single or bilateral lung allograft
- original disease cystic fibrosis, COPD, emphysema, idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis or A1AD
Exclusion Criteria:
- lung allograft retransplantation
- multiple organ transplantation
- severe gastrointestinal disorder
- malignancies or history of malignancy

facility.name: Department of Cardiothoracic, Transplantation and Vascular Surgery at Hannover Medical School

group.title: MMF - Cystic Fibrosis
group.description: Participants with cystic fibrosis having transplantation at Day 0, received mycophenolate mofetil (MMF) capsules at dose of 1.5 grams (g) twice daily (BID) from Day 2 to Day 30 post-transplantation and then at 1 g BID from Day 31 to Day 90 post-transplantation.

group.title: MMF - COPD, Emphysema, IPF, or A1AD
group.description: Participants with chronic obstructive pulmonary disorder (COPD), emphysema, idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis (IPF), or alpha-1 antitrypsin deficiency (A1AD) having transplantation at Day 0, received MMF capsules at dose of 1.5 g BID from Day 2 to Day 30 post-transplantation and then at 1 g BID from Day 31 to Day 90 post-transplantation.

baseline.population: The safety population included all participants who received at least one dose of study drug and a safety follow-up, whether withdrawn prematurely or not.

analysis.groups_desc: Cmax of MPA at Day 4. Analysis was performed using Wilcoxon rank sum test; corresponding p-value and point estimate (Hodges-Lehmann estimator) were calculated. The point estimator derived by sending the confidence level to zero is called as Hodges-Lehmann estimator.

Cmax of MPAG at Day 4. Analysis was performed using Wilcoxon rank sum test; corresponding p-value and point estimate (Hodges-Lehmann estimator) were calculated. The point estimator derived by sending the confidence level to zero is called as Hodges-Lehmann estimator.

Cmax of AcMPAG at Day 4. Analysis was performed using Wilcoxon rank sum test; corresponding p-value and point estimate (Hodges-Lehmann estimator) were calculated. The point estimator derived by sending the confidence level to zero is called as Hodges-Lehmann estimator.

measure.population: PP Population. Here, number of participants analyzed=participants who were evaluable for this outcome measure.

analysis.groups_desc: Free Fraction of Free MPA at Day 90. Analysis was performed using Wilcoxon rank sum test; corresponding p-value and point estimate (Hodges-Lehmann estimator) were calculated. The point estimator derived by sending the confidence level to zero is called as Hodges-Lehmann estimator.

outcome.description: FEV1 is the amount of air which can be forcibly exhaled from the lungs in the first second of a forced exhalation.
outcome.time_frame: Day 90 post-transplantation
outcome.population: ITT Population (total 64 participants). Here, Number of participants analyzed = participants evaluable for this outcome measure.
